name: Microsoft B75-00092 Wired Optical Mouse
Features: [Optical Technology, Navigate with better speed, accuracy and reliability—the optical sensor tracks movement on nearly any surface without the hassle of clogged mouse parts., 4-Way Scrolling, Scroll four ways for greater efficiency and comfort with Tilt Wheel Technology., Ergonomic Design, Point and click in comfort—ergonomic design helps you work longer without discomfort., Customizable Buttons, Get quick access to the media, programs, and files you use most often with customizable buttons.]
